title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-26.3 - Valuation date; taxable status date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-26.3 - Valuation date; taxable status date

State Regulations

The valuation date for a market value base survey, subsequent to the 1983 survey, is January 1, of the year designating the
survey. Sample parcels shall be appraised as of the valuation date according to
their physical condition and ownership as of the taxable status date of the
base year roll. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-26.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
